title: travelplanner: I am in need of a 7-day travel plan for a group of 8 travelers. We plan to depart from Chicago and visit 3 cities in Idaho from March 25th to March 31st, 2022. We've set our new budget at $22,200. In regards to dining preferences, we have a keen interest in Italian and Chinese cuisines. (2c2d5205b51cbe29)

always_included_messages.content: Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.

chat_history.content: I am in need of a 7-day travel plan for a group of 8 travelers. We plan to depart from Chicago and visit 3 cities in Idaho from March 25th to March 31st, 2022. We've set our new budget at $22,200. In regards to dining preferences, we have a keen interest in Italian and Chinese cuisines.

function.name: delegate
function.arguments: {"instructions":"Create a 7-day travel plan for a group of 8 travelers departing from Chicago and visiting 3 cities in Idaho from March 25th to March 31st, 2022. The budget is $22,200, and the group prefers Italian and Chinese cuisines. The cities to visit in Idaho are Boise, Coeur d'Alene, and Idaho Falls. Include transportation, accommodation, breakfast, lunch, dinner, and attractions for each day."}

chat_history.content:
### 7-Day Travel Plan for Idaho

#### Budget Overview
- Total Budget: $22,200
- Daily Budget: $3,171.43

#### Day 1: March 25, 2022 - Chicago to Boise
- **Flight**: Depart from Chicago at 09:48 AM, arrive in Boise at 12:51 PM.
- **Accommodation**: Modern & Cozy 2 BR Private Apartment in Boise ($843 per night)
- **Meals**:
  - Breakfast: On the flight
  - Lunch: California Pizza Kitchen (Italian, Chinese) - $15 per person
  - Dinner: Dhaba By Claridges (Italian, Chinese) - $65 per person
- **Attractions**: 
  - Visit Julia Davis Park
  - Explore Boise Art Museum

#### Day 2: March 26, 2022 - Boise
- **Accommodation**: Modern & Cozy 2 BR Private Apartment in Boise ($843 per night)
- **Meals**:
  - Breakfast: At accommodation
  - Lunch: Momo Point (Chinese) - $26 per person
  - Dinner: Zaika Muradabadi (Italian) - $88 per person
- **Attractions**:
  - Old Idaho Penitentiary Site
  - Discovery Center of Idaho

#### Day 3: March 27, 2022 - Boise to Coeur d'Alene
- **Transportation**: Self-driving from Boise to Coeur d'Alene
- **Accommodation**: No available data for Coeur d'Alene, assume similar cost to Boise ($843 per night)
- **Meals**:
  - Breakfast: At accommodation
  - Lunch: On the road
  - Dinner: Local restaurant in Coeur d'Alene
- **Attractions**: 
  - Explore local attractions in Coeur d'Alene

#### Day 4: March 28, 2022 - Coeur d'Alene
- **Accommodation**: No available data for Coeur d'Alene, assume similar cost to Boise ($843 per night)
- **Meals**:
  - Breakfast: At accommodation
  - Lunch: Local restaurant in Coeur d'Alene
  - Dinner: Local restaurant in Coeur d'Alene
- **Attractions**: 
  - Explore local attractions in Coeur d'Alene

#### Day 5: March 29, 2022 - Coeur d'Alene to Idaho Falls
- **Transportation**: Self-driving from Coeur d'Alene to Idaho Falls
- **Accommodation**: Sunny & Spacious 2 bdrm apt in Idaho Falls ($914 per night)
- **Meals**:
  - Breakfast: At accommodation
  - Lunch: Taste of China (Chinese) - $19 per person
  - Dinner: Dhuaan (Italian, Chinese) - $97 per person
- **Attractions**: 
  - Visit Museum of Idaho
  - Explore Idaho Falls River Walk - Greenbelt Trail

#### Day 6: March 30, 2022 - Idaho Falls
- **Accommodation**: Sunny & Spacious 2 bdrm apt in Idaho Falls ($914 per night)
- **Meals**:
  - Breakfast: At accommodation
  - Lunch: Punjabi Rasoi (Chinese) - $86 per person
  - Dinner: The Fusion Food Stand (Italian, Chinese) - $49 per person
- **Attractions**: 
  - Visit East Idaho Aquarium
  - Explore Russ Freeman Park

#### Day 7: March 31, 2022 - Idaho Falls to Chicago
- **Transportation**: Self-driving to Boise, then flight back to Chicago
- **Flight**: Depart from Boise at 16:00, arrive in Chicago at 18:53
- **Meals**:
  - Breakfast: At accommodation
  - Lunch: Local restaurant in Boise
  - Dinner: On the flight

### Summary of Costs
- **Flights**: $444 per person (round trip) x 8 = $3,552
- **Accommodation**: 
  - Boise: $843 x 2 nights = $1,686
  - Coeur d'Alene: $843 x 2 nights = $1,686
  - Idaho Falls: $914 x 2 nights = $1,828
- **Meals**: Approx. $100 per person per day x 7 days x 8 people = $5,600
- **Transportation**: Self-driving costs (gas, rental) = $2,000 (estimate)
- **Attractions**: Approx. $50 per person per day x 7 days x 8 people = $2,800

Total Estimated Cost: $19,152

Remaining Budget: $22,200 - $19,152 = $3,048

This plan ensures a comfortable and enjoyable trip within the budget, with a variety of activities and dining options.
chat_history.name: delegate

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").
current_city.title: Current City

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"
transportation.title: Transportation

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"
breakfast.title: Breakfast

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"
attraction.title: Attraction

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
accommodation.title: Accommodation

chat_history.name: attraction_search

chat_history.content:
### 7-Day Travel Plan for Idaho

#### Budget Overview
- Total Budget: $22,200
- Daily Budget: $3,171.43

#### Day 1: March 25, 2022 - Chicago to Boise
- **Flight**: Depart from Chicago at 09:48 AM, arrive in Boise at 12:51 PM.
- **Accommodation**: Modern & Cozy 2 BR Private Apartment in Boise ($843 per night)
- **Meals**:
  - Breakfast: On the flight
  - Lunch: California Pizza Kitchen (Italian, Chinese) - $15 per person
  - Dinner: Dhaba By Claridges (Italian, Chinese) - $65 per person
- **Attractions**: 
  - Visit Julia Davis Park
  - Explore Boise Art Museum

#### Day 2: March 26, 2022 - Boise
- **Accommodation**: Modern & Cozy 2 BR Private Apartment in Boise ($843 per night)
- **Meals**:
  - Breakfast: At accommodation
  - Lunch: Momo Point (Chinese) - $26 per person
  - Dinner: Zaika Muradabadi (Italian) - $88 per person
- **Attractions**:
  - Old Idaho Penitentiary Site
  - Discovery Center of Idaho

#### Day 3: March 27, 2022 - Boise to Coeur d'Alene
- **Transportation**: Self-driving from Boise to Coeur d'Alene
- **Accommodation**: No available data for Coeur d'Alene, assume similar cost to Boise ($843 per night)
- **Meals**:
  - Breakfast: At accommodation
  - Lunch: On the road
  - Dinner: Local restaurant in Coeur d'Alene
- **Attractions**: 
  - Explore local attractions in Coeur d'Alene

#### Day 4: March 28, 2022 - Coeur d'Alene
- **Accommodation**: No available data for Coeur d'Alene, assume similar cost to Boise ($843 per night)
- **Meals**:
  - Breakfast: At accommodation
  - Lunch: Local restaurant in Coeur d'Alene
  - Dinner: Local restaurant in Coeur d'Alene
- **Attractions**: 
  - Explore local attractions in Coeur d'Alene

#### Day 5: March 29, 2022 - Coeur d'Alene to Idaho Falls
- **Transportation**: Self-driving from Coeur d'Alene to Idaho Falls
- **Accommodation**: Sunny & Spacious 2 bdrm apt in Idaho Falls ($914 per night)
- **Meals**:
  - Breakfast: At accommodation
  - Lunch: Taste of China (Chinese) - $19 per person
  - Dinner: Dhuaan (Italian, Chinese) - $97 per person
- **Attractions**: 
  - Visit Museum of Idaho
  - Explore Idaho Falls River Walk - Greenbelt Trail

#### Day 6: March 30, 2022 - Idaho Falls
- **Accommodation**: Sunny & Spacious 2 bdrm apt in Idaho Falls ($914 per night)
- **Meals**:
  - Breakfast: At accommodation
  - Lunch: Punjabi Rasoi (Chinese) - $86 per person
  - Dinner: The Fusion Food Stand (Italian, Chinese) - $49 per person
- **Attractions**: 
  - Visit East Idaho Aquarium
  - Explore Russ Freeman Park

#### Day 7: March 31, 2022 - Idaho Falls to Chicago
- **Transportation**: Self-driving to Boise, then flight back to Chicago
- **Flight**: Depart from Boise at 16:00, arrive in Chicago at 18:53
- **Meals**:
  - Breakfast: At accommodation
  - Lunch: Local restaurant in Boise
  - Dinner: On the flight

### Summary of Costs
- **Flights**: $444 per person (round trip) x 8 = $3,552
- **Accommodation**: 
  - Boise: $843 x 2 nights = $1,686
  - Coeur d'Alene: $843 x 2 nights = $1,686
  - Idaho Falls: $914 x 2 nights = $1,828
- **Meals**: Approx. $100 per person per day x 7 days x 8 people = $5,600
- **Transportation**: Self-driving costs (gas, rental) = $2,000 (estimate)
- **Attractions**: Approx. $50 per person per day x 7 days x 8 people = $2,800

Total Estimated Cost: $19,152

Remaining Budget: $22,200 - $19,152 = $3,048

This plan ensures a comfortable and enjoyable trip within the budget, with a variety of activities and dining options.

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.
city.title: City

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.
city.title: City

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.
state.title: State

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.
departure_city.title: Departure City

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.
destination_city.title: Destination City

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.
date.title: Date

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.
origin.title: Origin

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.
destination.title: Destination

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.
city.title: City
